title: Poster, "Citicorp Center 1", late 20th century
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in black upper left corner: Call Citicorp / Real Eastate / Management / For Rental / Information / 559-8616 / 599-4741 / Or Call Your / Own Broker
Imprinted in white left center on edge: Credits: / Hugh Stubbins and Associates / Emery Roth and Sons / Architects / Le Messuries Associates / The Office of James Ruderman / Structural Engineers / Joseph R. Loring and Associates / Mechanical Engineers / Saski Associates / Landscape Architects / HRH Construction Corporation / General Contractor
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A color photographic reproduction of the site of the Citicorp Center under construction under a gray sky. The steel framework of the central office tower dominates the sheet and extends off the shet at top. A red crane is at center. Street corner and older buildings at bottom center and right. One building presented is "Di Palma" English and French Antiques. The title, CITICORP / CENTER, is presented in white block letters at lower right corner. In white, number 1 at lower left edge. Section of text in black at upper left corner and another section below, in white. A white band streches across bottom edge of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Citicorp Center 1", late 20th century.
late 20th century. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-151.
